game.l_dis:
Alien Hominid – Hardcore Side-Scrolling Shooter

Alien Hominid is a fast-paced, side-scrolling shooter where players take on the role of a small yellow alien who crashes on Earth and must battle secret agents and enemies to survive. Known for its hand-drawn visuals and intense gameplay, the series has grown from its Flash origins into versions like Alien Hominid HD and Alien Hominid Invasion.

What is Alien Hominid?

Alien Hominid began as a Flash game and became famous for its unforgiving but addictive combat. The alien wields a blaster, grenades, and melee attacks, while also using special abilities like digging underground or biting off enemy heads.

How to Play Alien Hominid?

  • Shoot & Blast: Use your blaster to eliminate waves of enemies.
  • Grenades & Melee: Throw grenades or engage in close combat for variety.
  • Special Abilities: Dig underground to avoid damage or use head-biting for brutal takedowns.
  • Survive: Avoid projectiles and defeat bosses to progress through levels.

Why Play Alien Hominid Unblocked?

With Alien Hominid Unblocked, players can enjoy the intense run-and-gun gameplay directly in their browser without restrictions. It offers solo and co-op modes for both casual fans and hardcore shooter enthusiasts.

Key Features

  • Classic Side-Scrolling Action: Fast-paced shooting against endless enemies.
  • Unique Abilities: Dig underground or bite enemies’ heads off for tactical advantages.
  • Hand-Drawn Graphics: Cartoon-style visuals that define the series.
  • Multiple Modes: Play solo or with a friend in co-op.
  • Unblocked Gameplay: Accessible anywhere through a browser.

Can You Survive Earth’s Secret Agents?

Step into the shoes of the Alien Hominid and fight your way through waves of enemies. Master the alien’s arsenal and survive one of the toughest side-scrolling shooters ever made.
